• Command
    • name
    • description
    • default_arguments
    • arguments
    • run
   1 # -*- coding=utf-8 -*-
   2 
   3 from __future__ import absolute_import, print_function, unicode_literals
   4 
   5 import argparse
   6 import os
   7 
   8 from ..actions.init import init_project
   9 from ._base import BaseCommand
  10 from .options import new_project_group
  11 
  12 
  13 class Command(BaseCommand):
  14 
  15     name = "init"
  16     description = "Create a new project."
  17     default_arguments = []
  18     arguments = [new_project_group]
  19 
  20     def run(self, options):
  21         pipfile_path = os.path.join(options.project, "Pipfile")
  22         if os.path.exists(pipfile_path):
  23             raise argparse.ArgumentError(
  24                 "{0!r} is already a Pipfile project".format(options.project),
  25             )
  26         return init_project(
  27             root=options.project, python_version=options.python_version
  28         )
  29 
  30 
  31 if __name__ == "__main__":
  32     Command.run_parser()
